verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> Depart,<WH3212> and go<WH5927> up hence,<WH2088> you and the people<WH5971> which<WH834> you have brought<WH5927> up out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> to the land<WH776> which<WH834> I swore<WH7650> to Abraham,<WH85> to Isaac,<WH3327> and to Jacob,<WH3290> saying,<WH559> To your seed<WH2233> will I give<WH5414> it:

And I will send<WH7971> an angel<WH4397> before<WH6440> you; and I will drive<WH1644> out the Canaanite,<WH3669> the Amorite,<WH567> and the Hittite,<WH2850> and the Perizzite,<WH6522> the Hivite,<WH2340> and the Jebusite:<WH2983>

To a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey:<WH1706> for I will not go<WH5927> up in the middle<WH7130> of you; for you are a stiff necked<WH7186> <WH6203> people:<WH5971> lest<WH6435> I consume<WH3615> you in the way.<WH1870>
And when the people<WH5971> heard<WH8085> these evil<WH7451> tidings,<WH1697> they mourned:<WH56> and no<WH3808> man<WH376> did put<WH7896> on him his ornaments.<WH5716>

For the LORD<WH3068> had said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Say<WH559> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> You are a stiff necked<WH7186> <WH6203> people:<WH5971> I will come<WH5927> up into the middle<WH7130> of you in a moment,<WH7281> and consume<WH3615> you: therefore now<WH6258> put<WH3381> off your ornaments<WH5716> from you, that I may know<WH3045> what<WH4100> to do<WH6213> to you.
And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> stripped<WH5337> themselves of their ornaments<WH5716> by the mount<WH2022> Horeb.<WH2722>

And Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the tabernacle,<WH168> and pitched<WH5186> it without<WH2351> the camp,<WH4264> afar<WH7368> off from the camp,<WH4264> and called<WH7121> it the Tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation.<WH4150> And it came<WH1961> to pass, that every<WH3605> one which sought<WH1245> the LORD<WH3068> went<WH3318> out to the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> which<WH834> was without<WH2351> the camp.<WH4264>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when Moses<WH4872> went<WH3318> out to the tabernacle,<WH168> that all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> rose<WH6965> up, and stood<WH5324> every<WH376> man<WH376> at his tent<WH168> door,<WH6607> and looked<WH5027> after<WH310> Moses,<WH4872> until<WH5704> he was gone<WH935> into the tabernacle.<WH168>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, as Moses<WH4872> entered<WH935> into the tabernacle,<WH168> the cloudy<WH6051> pillar<WH5982> descended,<WH3381> and stood<WH5975> at the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle,<WH168> and the Lord talked<WH1696> with Moses.<WH4872>

And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> saw<WH7200> the cloudy<WH6051> pillar<WH5982> stand<WH5975> at the tabernacle<WH168> door:<WH6607> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> rose<WH6965> up and worshipped,<WH7812> every man<WH376> in his tent<WH168> door.<WH6607>

And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> face<WH6440> to face,<WH6440> as a man<WH376> speaks<WH1696> to his friend.<WH7453> And he turned<WH7725> again<WH7725> into<WH413> the camp:<WH4264> but his servant<WH8334> Joshua,<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> a young<WH5288> man, departed<WH4185> not out of the tabernacle.<WH168>

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to the LORD,<WH3068> See,<WH7200> you say<WH559> to me, Bring<WH5927> up this<WH2088> people:<WH5971> and you have not let me know<WH3045> whom<WH853> <WH834> you will send<WH7971> with me. Yet you have said,<WH559> I know<WH3045> you by name,<WH8034> and you have also<WH1571> found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in my sight.<WH5869>

Now<WH6258> therefore, I pray<WH4994> you, if<WH518> I have found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in your sight,<WH5869> show<WH3045> me now<WH4994> your way,<WH1870> that I may know<WH3045> you, that I may find<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in your sight:<WH5869> and consider<WH7200> that this nation<WH1471> is your people.<WH5971>
And he said,<WH559> My presence<WH6440> shall go<WH3212> with you, and I will give you rest.<WH5117>
And he said<WH559> to him, If<WH518> your presence<WH6440> go<WH1980> not with me, carry<WH5927> us not up hence.<WH2088>

For wherein<WH4100> shall it be known<WH3045> here<WH645> that I and your people<WH5971> have found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in your sight?<WH5869> is it not in that you go<WH3212> with us? so shall we be separated,<WH6395> I and your people,<WH5971> from all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> that are on the face<WH6440> of the earth.<WH127>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> I will do<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing<WH1697> also<WH1571> that you have spoken:<WH1696> for you have found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in my sight,<WH5869> and I know<WH3045> you by name.<WH8034>
And he said,<WH559> I beseech<WH4994> you, show<WH7200> me your glory.<WH3519>

And he said,<WH559> I will make all<WH3605> my goodness<WH2898> pass<WH5674> before<WH5921> <WH6440> you, and I will proclaim<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> before<WH6440> you; and will be gracious<WH2603> to whom<WH853> <WH834> I will be gracious,<WH2603> and will show mercy<WH7355> on whom<WH853> <WH834> I will show mercy.<WH7355>
And he said,<WH559> You can<WH3201> not see<WH7200> my face:<WH6440> for there shall no<WH3808> man<WH120> see<WH7200> me, and live.<WH2425>
And the LORD<WH3068> said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> there is a place<WH4725> by me, and you shall stand<WH5324> on a rock:<WH6697>

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, while<WH5704> my glory<WH3519> passes<WH5674> by, that I will put<WH7760> you in a cleft<WH5366> of the rock,<WH6697> and will cover<WH5526> you with my hand<WH3709> while<WH5704> I pass<WH5674> by:
And I will take<WH5493> away my hand,<WH3709> and you shall see<WH7200> my back<WH268> parts: but my face<WH6440> shall not be seen.<WH7200>
